subject: History
title: Hiroshima and Nagasaki
description: Learn Hiroshima and Nagasaki in one minute.

hook.text: Two bombs. Two cities. Over 200,000 dead. The world entered the nuclear age on August 6, 1945.

buildup.text: The Manhattan Project secretly developed atomic weapons. Truman authorized their use to end the war quickly.

discovery.text: On August 6, 'Little Boy' destroyed Hiroshima. Three days later, 'Fat Man' destroyed Nagasaki.

twist.text: Japan's military leaders were split even after Hiroshima. Only the Emperor's personal intervention broke the deadlock.
